title: Golden Book of World Records
description: Faculty member recognized in the Golden Book of World Records for outstanding contributions to computing research.

title: Best Research Paper Award
description: Our research paper on quantum computing received the Best Paper Award at the International Computing Conference.

title: Coyotech Innovation Award
description: Department received the Coyotech Innovation Award for excellence in industry-academia collaboration.

title: Student Excellence Recognition
description: Students recognized for exceptional performance in AI and machine learning projects.
